General.Name: OCR Group Bhd
General.Description: OCR Group Berhad, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the property development activities in Malaysia. It operates through three segments: Construction Services, Property Development, and Others. The company is involved in the development, construction, and sale of residential and commercial properties; property investment and real estate activities; and provision of property management and project management consultation services. The company was formerly known as O&C Resources Berhad and changed its name to OCR Group Berhad in December 2017. OCR Group Berhad was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
